name: ankur
description: WordPress block theme supporting full site editing

scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run prettier:check && npm run lint:php
scripts.fix: npm run prettier:write && npm run phpcb
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && wp-scripts build && npm run i18n
scripts.copy: copyfiles assets/**/* inc/**/* parts/**/* patterns/**/* src/**/* styles/**/* templates/**/* *.php readme.txt screenshot.jpg style.css theme.json ankur.pot build/ankur
scripts.export: npm run mkdir:build && npm run copy && npm run zip
scripts.i18n: npm run i18n:textdomain && npm run i18n:pot

author: Paul Eiche <peiche@gmail.com>
